AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Drudgery worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born as a worker under the queen, [PAWN_nameDef] will likely never live to do anything but be that which many will trade for; someone more than capable of dumb labor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Royal attendant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tireless servant responsible for the caring, cleaning and feeding of the queen.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Disgraced guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked to protect [PAWN_possessive] queen from danger, but fell from grace after an embarrassing incident involving a pineapple. \nStripped of [PAWN_possessive] position and ashamed, every time [PAWN_nameDef] looks upon a piece of fruit [PAWN_pronoun] is reminded of [PAWN_possessive] failure.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Scout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The long periods spent out of the hive has made [PAWN_nameDef] a resilient individual, well suited to reconnaissance and vanguard work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Undertaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for disposing of corpses outside of the hive. This was a thankless yet vital job, lest the dead bodies attract predators.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Honeycomb architect
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Responsible for secreting wax and building the honeycombs, [PAWN_nameDef] would spend most of [PAWN_possessive] time doing exactly that, and only that. Unfortunately, [PAWN_possessive] constant business had left [PAWN_possessive] with little time for socialization or other skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pollen gatherer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an agricultural buff, rather common amongst the Apini. Pollen gathering is an essential job, for without honey the hive will starve through winter

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hiveless
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is without a hive, and without a home. Displaced, [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn to survive on [PAWN_possessive] own. Yet [PAWN_nameDef] also discovered the beauty in everything around [PAWN_pronoun].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: BuzzArtist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an entrepreneur in what humans called confectionery. [PAWN_pronoun] had experimented in making many tasty honey based creations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Busybody
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always works tirelessly and hastily to expand and decorate the hive. [PAWN_pronoun] had to do [PAWN_possessive] job so fast that [PAWN_pronoun] never even had time to look at the sky.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wasp wannabee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: “Bees are, like totally boring”, “I wish mom hadn’t been a fat slob who killed dad”, “It’s not a phase, guys! Whatever, I’m going with the Hornets” are many a phrase [PAWN_nameDef] uttered in adolescence. \n [PAWN_nameDef] stuck by these thoughts for the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life, finding [PAWN_possessive]self outcast for [PAWN_possessive]… alternative thinking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Veteran soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Dangerous and lethal, [PAWN_nameDef] is likely the definition of “nope” in many galactic textbooks. However [PAWN_pronoun] has a softer side, dutifully tending [PAWN_possessive] fellow soldiers on the battlefield.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pollen-tician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A recent position, made out of spite of the traditional monarchy, [PAWN_nameDef] has become a Pollen-tician, much to the despair of [PAWN_possessive] community

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: B-lazer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] likes fire. [PAWN_pronoun] likes it a lot. Where most avoid the smoke and heat, [PAWN_nameDef] is drawn to the substance, seeing it as a way of expressing [PAWN_possessive] lust for power and individual freedom.\n By Apini standards, [PAWN_pronoun] is the equivalent of the most despicable human sociopath.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Layabout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In search of an easy life, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] life avoiding the hard work in the hive, so much so that one day [PAWN_pronoun] was noticed and banished.\n [PAWN_pronoun] lived the rest of [PAWN_possessive] life in a improvised house bothering anyone [PAWN_pronoun] met for any easy job.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Nanny
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] cared for the young of the hive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Caravaneer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] went out often and traded goods from the hive. [PAWN_pronoun] became good at negotiating with others and handling the animals, but wasn't taught much in the way of menial skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Alpaca shepherd
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always had a fascination with the fluffy Alpaca, curiosity turned into an unhealthy obsession and after a rather embarrassing incident, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced out of the colony.\nOut to start anew, bringing with [PAWN_possessive] [PAWN_possessive] love for the fluffiest of creatures.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hive protector
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As an adult, [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with guarding the hive against Azuri swarms. [PAWN_nameDef] had to rely on other Apini to make sure [PAWN_pronoun] stayed supplied so [PAWN_pronoun] could dedicate all [PAWN_possessive] time to [PAWN_possessive] vigilance.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wax sculptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always felt using wax for petty things like 'walls' and 'floors' was a great waste of beesources. Due to this, [PAWN_nameDef] begun to capture beeutiful bee figures and craft unbeleevably opulent wares.\nUnfortunately, much to [PAWN_possessive] hive's disdain and concern, [PAWN_nameDef] became something of a recluse and a wax thief. [PAWN_possessive] beehavior was reluctantly tolerated by the rest of the hive - if only because of the art's value to exotic trade.
